au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.rig.primitive

Class SlaveActiveAllowed

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.rig.primitive.SlaveActiveAllowed
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPrimitiveAcl

    public class SlaveActiveAllowed
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPrimitiveAcl
    Implementation of primitve control access control class which allows the master and slave active roles to perform primitive control. This slave passive role is prohibited from performing any action of classes that extend this class.
